availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah O'Neal Ford in Gallatin County, Kentucky on November 25, 1827. Father of Elizabeth Ford, Rosetta O. Ford, James W. Ford, Nancy A. Ford, Luteitia Ford, Angeline Ford, and Andrew J. Ford. Farmer in Grant County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Grant County in 1860. Owned two enslaved individuals in Grant County in 1850. Owned four enslaved individuals in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 324B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 3 of microfilm.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 894.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 3.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Gallatin County Marriages, Film #000509036, p. 326 of microfilm.
